Vue v-bind=\"$attrs\".description: In combination with `inheritAttrs: false`, apply attributes to some other element instead of the root element.

Vue v-bind=\"$listeners\".description: In combination with `inheritAttrs: false`, apply listeners to some other element instead of the root element.

Vue v-bind=\"$attrs\" v-on=\"$listeners\.description: In combination with `inheritAttrs: false`, apply attributes and listeners to some other element instead of the root element.
